title: Trinity with adaptive passive damage
body: Removing Lich Bane and adding a cool new dynamic to the game. Thoughts?

replies.body: Except removing lichbane just removes the AP version of Triforce for no real reason.
Give Lich Bane Phage's passive DansGame
I'd be down for Lich Bane to be turned into an AP Triforce-esque item in exchange for it losing some damage from the passive. More kiting for mages.

i mean it already gets the +7% movespeed or something from the aether wisp component, and unlike triforce which is primarily build by melee bruisers with poor mobility and sticking power, most lichbane users are battle mages or assassins, don't actually need to stick to their targets, possessing either sufficient lockdown, mobility or straight up burst, to not need any ability to stay in close proximity to an enemy.

Imo lichbane is in an alright spot, though I would feel it would be a better early buy if it had 80% base ad ratio on the onhit bonus, rather than it's current 75%.
